color.description: The color of the Enter Card Manually text displayed at the bottom of the screen when the background is a dark color
color.name: bouncerEnterCardManuallyColorDark

color.description: The color of the Enter Card Manually text displayed at the bottom of the screen when the background is a light color
color.name: bouncerEnterCardManuallyColorLight

dimen.description: The minimum amount of space surrounding the Enter Card Mandually text at the bottom of the screen
dimen.name: bouncerEnterCardManuallyMargin

dimen.description: The size of the Enter Card Manually text at the bottom of the screen
dimen.name: bouncerEnterCardManuallyTextSize

string.description: Text shown at the bottom of the screen offering for the user to type in card details manually
string.name: bouncer_enter_card_manually
